    • Method Detail

      • createClub

        public void createClub(int width,
                       int height)
        Creates a club on a position that is not on the walls. Can't be on player's position, but this is checked in another function.
        Parameters:
        width - This is the map's width
        height - This is the map's height

      • stunOgre

        public void stunOgre()
        Stuns ogre if it gets close to the hero, but its club doesn't kill him.
